directives.title: Finish LessonCraft TestFlight build
directives.description: RC1 Gold Copy v1.0.0 build 2 shipped (commit 12674f5). Live Session removed, dead files cleaned, debug prints stripped. Jeff needs to git pull → Xcode Archive → TestFlight upload.
directives.notes: Code is ready. Still blocked on Jeff actions: git pull, archive, upload, and App Store Connect Privacy Policy URL update.

directives.title: Polish TermLinkky UI
directives.description: App is still crashy and glitchy - needs polish

directives.title: Build both Android and Apple versions
directives.description: All apps should have both platforms

directives.title: Get ready to test — refine UI, update Xcode
directives.description: Need to get everything updated to Xcode, want to get everything refined. Still need to review the UI.
directives.notes: Further refined Feb 12: Morning Light calendar strip, Easter calendar strip, image-backed cards, Study tab redesign, print store expansion.

directives.title: Complete audio audit — all files must stream to app
directives.description: Do a complete audit and test of all files streaming to the app. Cannot have them not work.
directives.notes: Catalog reports 126/126 episodes with audioAvailable=true. Segment-level audio URLs populated across all 6 series.

directives.title: Build media asset dashboard on command center
directives.description: Create web interface showing LessonCraft segments, media assets, images — visual form with direct access.

directives.title: Keep tracker updated — don't let it go stale
directives.description: Jeff noticed tracker data was stale from Feb 6. Must keep projects, features, and directives current. Nightly audit cron installed.
directives.notes: Nightly audit executed again Feb 12/13 with full tracker refresh.

directives.title: Flood feeds with AI Tuned artwork
directives.description: Jeff wants AI Tuned social media flooded with beautiful AI-generated LDS devotional artwork. All original, v3 style.
directives.notes: Gallery now at 120 artworks. TikTok account created. Posting pipeline still being built.

directives.title: NO TABLES in Telegram
directives.description: Jeff can't read tables on mobile. Bullet points ONLY.

directives.title: A+ quality or don't ship
directives.description: No halfass work. Every feature fully functional, thoroughly planned. No placeholders in production.

directives.title: Gospel Tuned AI branding — no generic 'AI' in user-facing text
directives.description: All user-facing references must say 'Gospel Tuned AI' or 'AITuned', never just 'AI'.
directives.notes: Commit 6764d11. Apply to all future Gospel Tuned apps.

directives.title: Question-driven class engagement, not lecture-with-questions
directives.description: Class Engagement must be facilitated discussion — 70% sharing / 30% teaching.

directives.title: Each card needs unique artwork — no repeats
directives.description: Each card has an appropriate related image and don't repeat images.

directives.title: Voice roster locked — 6 narrators, 5 voices
directives.description: Final roster: Jared/Cedar, Nathan/Ash, Sarah/Nova, Emily/Marin, Hannah/Sage, Kristi/Nova.

directives.title: Build JD Art Gallery in app TODAY
directives.description: Build gallery browser, add home jump-to-gallery, make art 4K for Printful, register jacquedubois.art domain.
directives.notes: Gallery + print ordering shipped. Website live with real images. Remaining Jeff action: domain registration/admin completion.

directives.title: CFM Teaching Coach — inline term explanations + teaching segment
directives.description: Add inline technical term explanations during narration + dedicated Teaching Coach segment after deep dive closing.
directives.notes: Week 7 sample generated and approved directionally. Full 52-week rollout pending.

directives.title: Altus Fine Art inspiration — multiple art style collections
directives.description: JD Gallery should include multiple style collections (sacrocubism, geometric temples, minimalist line art, folk art, patriotic, etc.).
directives.notes: Catalog expanded to 120 artworks across 9+ collections.

directives.title: Move heartbeat processing off main chat
directives.description: Do not show heartbeat processing in Jeff's main Telegram chat. Run heartbeat on ops agent only.
directives.notes: Heartbeat removed from agents.defaults and moved to ops agent only. Ops model set to Haiku.

directives.title: Use Codex/Kimi for research and scraping work
directives.description: Use cheaper models (Codex or Kimi2.5) for research/scraping/build tasks instead of Opus when possible.
directives.notes: Applied to HVAC research sub-agent. Continue applying across ops/research flows.

directives.title: Fix jacquedubois.art to show real artwork
directives.description: Site was showing placeholder color blocks. Must show real gallery images and verify live URL before claiming done.
directives.notes: Rebuilt site from live catalog, resolved cache issues, confirmed deploy URL and custom domain.

directives.title: HomeView square cards layout approved
directives.description: Row 1: Prepare + Learn squares. Row 2: This Week's Study + JD Gallery squares. Be Inspired bar below.

directives.title: Print store expansion with realistic previews
directives.description: Add orientation-aware previews, frame mockup around image, size selector with actual image fit, frame color picker, and product type selector.
directives.notes: Major portion shipped (7 product types + frame colors + checkout flow). Additional preview polish still pending.
